Package com.bizosys.hsearch.index

Interface Summary
IDimension One document has multiple dimension.
 

Class Summary
Doc Documents are the unit of indexing and search.
DocAcl Stores the view and edit permission of a document.
DocContent Stores the fields of the document.
DocMeta It Stores meta information about the document.
DocTeaser Documents could be coming as structured or unstructured in a unified platform.
DocTerms This is the term vector specific to a document.
DocumentType Defines various document types.
IdMapping As multiple data format can be stored, an internal unique key is generated.
IndexLog  
IndexReader Performs Reads Operation on HSearch Index
IndexService Initializes both the read and write index services.
IndexWriter Performs write operation on HSearch index
InvertedIndex The inverted Index data structure and byte operations.
PreviewAppendRecord  
PreviewDeleteRecord  
Term Each word stores as a term inside the index.
TermColumns Term Columns keep multiple terms belonging to the column containing that term.
TermFamilies This contain multiple term columns for a given term family.
TermList Multiple terms grouped as termlist
TermsBlockRecord This is a Row from Index table which has the ability to merge and store with previous values.
TermStream Wrapped Type TokenStream with sighting information.
TermTables Multiple term families grouped inside a Termtable
TermType Defines various term types.
TermWeight Configurable Term Sighting Score weights.
